alert.note: Alert for Carson; Potter (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 04 at 2:11PM CDT until June 04 at 2:45PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN ARMSTRONG...CARSON AND EASTERN POTTER COUNTIES... At 211 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles west of Panhandle, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Amarillo, Panhandle, Washburn and Pantex. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
